name: Operation Blackout - Situation Defused
description:
Set at an apartment- complex, you are tasked with finding and defusing all of the bombs. With 3 stages of difficulty, this game is sure to be challenging even for seasoned gamers. Take to the from line with a 9mm semi-automatic handgun, an M4 automatic assault rifle and as much ammunition as you can shoot. you have 10 minutes to find all of the bombs before they detonate and level the whole complex.

OH, and did I mention the enemy terrorists? Do whatever it takes to stay alive. But remember, you only have 10 minutes...
